Articles.Content:
There is only 2 mods that, I know of Hooligan Labs Airships would be the best but looks broke [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more) and then theres Procedural Airships but there big [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99132-0-90-Procedural-Airships-1-3-dec-20th-2014](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99132-0-90-Procedural-Airships-1-3-dec-20th-2014)

- - - Updated - - -

EDIT- Pretty cool video [http://www.space.com/28081-nasa-vision-for-venus-havoc-airships-video.html#ooid=d4b2dmcjqtpyv-ZP7zBHwKv3sxmz4LbS](http://www.space.com/28081-nasa-vision-for-venus-havoc-airships-video.html#ooid=d4b2dmcjqtpyv-ZP7zBHwKv3sxmz4LbS)
USI Sounding Rockets has a release candidate that includes a balloon and blimp. [Have tried the blimp](https://twitter.com/KSA_MissionCtrl/status/583627201934942209), works great

> 
> There is only 2 mods that, I know of Hooligan Labs Airships would be the best but looks broke [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more) and then theres Procedural Airships but there big [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99132-0-90-Procedural-Airships-1-3-dec-20th-2014](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99132-0-90-Procedural-Airships-1-3-dec-20th-2014)
